channel.title: JaGeX Recruitment
channel.description:
Ok, I Would Like To Say That I Am A Very Good Java Coder....I Made 1337MoparScape Server And It Got Over 30 Players Online Because Of My LagHandlers. Ok So On Another Note There Is This Bot That Is In The Works And I Think We Could Join Together And Make It To Cheat Runescape Ok??? The Reason I Would Like Us To Be Partners For RunescapeCheatBot-Version 0.189234 BETA Is That You Could Like, Get Hooks For Me Because My Updater Always Breaks....I Would Like If You Checked These Hooks For Me Please: Ok I Would Like To Say That The Bot Is Going GREAT! We Could Better It If We Work Together Though........Here Is A Snippet Of The Coad U Cud Sample And Input Back To Us.... package com.automatix.bot.Bot.loader; import com.automatix.bot.functionality.util.Debugger; import java.applet.Applet; import java.net.URLClassLoader; import java.net.URL; import java.net.MalformedURLException; /** * Created by IntelliJ IDEA. * User: Administrator * Date: Dec 18, 2008 * Time: 8:48:56 PM */ public class AppletInstance { static Debugger debug = new Debugger(); static AppletInstance appletInstance = new AppletInstance(); public static Applet addNewRSBot(String world) { try { URLClassLoader theClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[]{new URL("file:runescape.jar")}); Applet theApplet = (Applet) theClassLoader.loadClass("client").newInstance(); theApplet.setStub(new StubGenerator(world)); theApplet.init(); theApplet.start(); debug.debug(appletInstance, "Applet loaded on world: " + world); return theApplet; } catch (MalformedURLException e) { e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates. } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates. } catch (IllegalAccessException e) { e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates. } catch (InstantiationException e) { e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates. } return null; } } Thx For Reading Guis...
Why are they so ignorant, don't they want my elite java coding skill??

item.title: JaGeX Recruitment
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Ok, I Would Like To Say That I Am A Very Good Java Coder....I Made 1337MoparScape Server And It Got Over 30 Players Online Because Of My LagHandlers.

Ok So On Another Note There Is This Bot That Is In The Works And I Think We Could Join Together And Make It To Cheat Runescape Ok??? The Reason I Would Like Us To Be Partners For RunescapeCheatBot-Version 0.189234 BETA Is That You Could Like, Get Hooks For Me Because My Updater Always Breaks…I Would Like If You Checked These Hooks For Me Please:

Ok I Would Like To Say That The Bot Is Going GREAT! We Could Better It If We Work Together Though…Here Is A Snippet Of The Coad U Cud Sample And Input Back To Us…

package com.automatix.bot.Bot.loader;

import com.automatix.bot.functionality.util.Debugger;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.net.URLClassLoader;
import java.net.URL;
import java.net.MalformedURLException;

/**

  • Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
  • User: Administrator
  • Date: Dec 18, 2008
  • Time: 8:48:56 PM
    */
    public class AppletInstance {
    static Debugger debug = new Debugger();
    static AppletInstance appletInstance = new AppletInstance();
    public static Applet addNewRSBot(String world) {
    try {
    URLClassLoader theClassLoader = new URLClassLoader(new URL[]{new URL(“file:runescape.jar”)});
    Applet theApplet = (Applet) theClassLoader.loadClass(“client”).newInstance();
    theApplet.setStub(new StubGenerator(world));
    theApplet.init();
    theApplet.start();
    debug.debug(appletInstance, "Applet loaded on world: " + world);
    return theApplet;
    } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
    e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates.
    } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
    e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates.
    } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
    e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates.
    } catch (InstantiationException e) {
    e.printStackTrace(); //To change body of catch statement use File | Settings | File Templates.
    }
    return null;
    }
    }

Thx For Reading Guis…

Why are they so ignorant, don’t they want my elite java coding skill??
